text: @realDonaldTrump It won’t save Americans who’ll die from your Trumpvirus Coronavirus. Sad the 120,000 that have already died and the millions of family members who will never see their family members or say goodbye. You never mention them, which says a lot about you. Horrible moral characters!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
